participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: imaginative and whimsical, often lost in daydreams.
participant_1.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: nurturing and thoughtful, with a love for nature and teaching.
participant_2.background: i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i've a dogs. i work as a school teacher. i'm a woman.

content.text: i would enjoy that   it is lonely in the clouds
